CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Real-time policy tuning analysis
CurrentVersion.description:
Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New VDI solution for Teams
CurrentVersion.description: New VDI solution for Teams is a redesigned version of the existing VDI solution, providing enhanced performance, reliability, and security. It offers additional features such as advanced meeting capabilities and a simpler app update experience for users. This Roadmap entry applies to Windows endpoints connecting to Azure Virtual Desktops, Windows 365 and Citrix VDI environments only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New VDI solution for Teams
OldVersion.description: New VDI solution for Teams is a redesigned version of the existing VDI solution, providing enhanced performance, reliability, and security. It offers additional features such as advanced meeting capabilities and a simpler app update experience for users. This Roadmap entry applies to Windows endpoints connecting to Azure Virtual Desktops, Windows 365 and Citrix VDI environments only.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the Classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the tittle and description to highlight that this feature is coming to the Classic Outlook for Windows, we apologize for the inconvenience it might have caused. Use the To Do app without leaving the Classic Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the Classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: We are updating the tittle and description to highlight that this feature is coming to the Classic Outlook for Windows, we apologize for the inconvenience it might have caused. Use the To Do app without leaving the Classic Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Microsoft To Do availability in Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft To Do will be available from the Outlook on the web app launcher. To Do will replace the tasks module currently available. After this change, you will see To Do in the app launcher instead of tasks.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Microsoft To Do availability in Outlook on the web
OldVersion.description: Microsoft To Do will be available from the Outlook on the web app launcher. To Do will replace the tasks module currently available. After this change, you will see To Do in the app launcher instead of tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Entry point change - apps when reading emails moved to the ribbon
CurrentVersion.description: The Apps flyout and entry point for pinned apps will be moved to the Home tab in the Ribbon in the New Outlook and Outlook for Web. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Entry point change - apps when reading emails moved to the ribbon
OldVersion.description: The Apps flyout and entry point for pinned apps will be moved to the Home tab in the Ribbon in the New Outlook and Outlook for Web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Cloud Policy service audit logs for policy changes
CurrentVersion.description: Activities performed by administrators within the Cloud Policy service, like editing a policy configuration, will generate Audit logs stored in Purview Audit and will be accessible by Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Cloud Policy service audit logs for policy changes
OldVersion.description: Activities performed by administrators within the Cloud Policy service, like editing a policy configuration, will generate Audit logs stored in Purview Audit and will be accessible by Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Scoped and targeted device clean up rule
CurrentVersion.description: This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Scoped and targeted device clean up rule
OldVersion.description: This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
OldVersion.description: Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for Advanced Insights App
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Viva Insights simplifies the query-building process for analysts by suggesting metrics, filters, and attributes that are relevant to the analysis.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for Advanced Insights App
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Viva Insights simplifies the query-building process for analysts by suggesting metrics, filters, and attributes that are relevant to the analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Roster grouping for in-room participants through proximity join for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When joining a meeting in a Microsoft Teams Room on Windows with a companion device, in-room participants will be grouped under the room node. Participants must join through Proximity Join with Microsoft Teams Rooms.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Roster grouping for in-room participants through proximity join for Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: When joining a meeting in a Microsoft Teams Room on Windows with a companion device, in-room participants will be grouped under the room node. Participants must join through Proximity Join with Microsoft Teams Rooms.

CurrentVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
CurrentVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

OldVersion.title: Forms: Try the new streamlined and modernized experience in Forms to create your next form
OldVersion.description: Enjoy a simpler, modernized interface on Forms. Toggle between upgraded templates as you create your form and then view insights and suggested actions when the responses come in.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
OldVersion.description: Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Third party add-in user report can be sent to Microsoft for analysis
CurrentVersion.description: Admins and security analysts of organizations who use a third-party reporting add-in in Outlook can configure using user-reported settings to send their user reports to Microsoft for analysis and learning.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Third party add-in user report can be sent to Microsoft for analysis
OldVersion.description: Admins and security analysts of organizations who use a third-party reporting add-in in Outlook can configure using user-reported settings to send their user reports to Microsoft for analysis and learning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Refreshed view of all your teams and channels page
CurrentVersion.description: A new ‘your teams and channels’ view provides you with a centralized hub where you can see all your teams and navigate to their channels from one page. This interface streamlines your workflows, enabling you to quickly access and manage your teams and channels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Refreshed view of all your teams and channels page
OldVersion.description: A new ‘your teams and channels’ view provides you with a centralized hub where you can see all your teams and navigate to their channels from one page. This interface streamlines your workflows, enabling you to quickly access and manage your teams and channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Integration of Glint and Pulse results into Copilot Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rollout out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. View results from responses to surveys initiated from Viva Glint or Viva Pulse directly in the Viva Insights Copilot Dashboard.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Integration of Glint and Pulse results into Copilot Dashboard
OldVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rollout out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. View results from responses to surveys initiated from Viva Glint or Viva Pulse directly in the Viva Insights Copilot Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in Outlook for Mac, for a consistent and fast experience.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in Outlook for Mac, for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot on OneNote canvas
CurrentVersion.description: Gather and create notes with Copilot in your personal non-shared OneNote notebooks directly on the page.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot on OneNote canvas
OldVersion.description: Use Copilot right in your workflow by invoking Copilot to generate a summary, a to-do list, or help you rewrite the content on the page or based on your selection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and response to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used in Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Detect Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions template
OldVersion.description: Communication Compliance is introducing a new template dedicated to analyzing all Copilot for Microsoft 365 prompts and response to help ensure content prohibited by customers’ policies, such as harassing or threatening language, is not being used in Copilot for Microsoft 365 interfaces. This scales Communication Compliance’s reach, consistent with Microsoft 365’s expanding interfaces. In addition, administrators are also able to select Copilot chats as a checked location in the policy creation wizard for any new or existing policies. This empowers administrators to fine-tune their management strategy precisely to their organization’s needs, with a focus on user privacy protection. Whether it's setting specific conditions or deploying trainable classifiers, this feature provides flexibility and adaptability in compliance management, ensuring your organization's communications remain secure, compliant, and respectful of user privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Space analytics with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: ?In space analytics, use Copilot to analyze and explain key data points and trends in your space utilization graphs. It compares current utilization metrics such as occupancy, desk usage, and room bookings against previous time periods (e.g. last month, last quarter), highlighting important changes and trends.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Space analytics with Copilot
OldVersion.description: ?In space analytics, use Copilot to analyze and explain key data points and trends in your space utilization graphs. It compares current utilization metrics such as occupancy, desk usage, and room bookings against previous time periods (e.g. last month, last quarter), highlighting important changes and trends.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - IRM alerts in XDR
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, IRM alerts and other supporting data will be available in the following Microsoft Defender XDR experiences: 1. IRM alerts will be surfaced in unified alert and Incident queue in Microsoft Defender XDR. 2. IRM alerts, Indicators, and enriched events will be available in Microsoft Defender XDR advanced hunting. Analysts can leverage KQL queries to identify potentially hidden risky patterns in data security related user activity. 3. IRM alert, Indicators, and enriched events will be exposed through Graph API. This feature can be enabled through “Share data with Microsoft Defender XDR” within Microsoft Insider Risk Management settings. To ensure privacy of the data, all IRM data in Microsoft Defender XDR can only be accessed by users with Insider risk analyst or Insider risk investigator permissions in Purview. Existing analysts accessing IRM data in purview will continue to access IRM data in Microsoft Defender XDR. IRM data in Microsoft Defender XDR does not honor anonymization. This is to enable effective correlation of IRM alerts with alerts from other solutions in Microsoft Defender XDR platform (such as Defender for Endpoint, Defender for Cloud apps, etc.). Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

This is to enable effective correlation of IRM alerts with alerts from other solutions in Microsoft Defender XDR platform (such as Defender for Endpoint, Defender for Cloud apps, etc.). Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Reset people suggestions in Outlook search for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through settings in the Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. When a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Reset people suggestions in Outlook search for GCC, GCC High, and DoD
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through settings in the Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. When a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC, GCC High, and DoD #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Enhancements to Copilot admin page
CurrentVersion.description: The Copilot page in the Microsoft 365 admin center is the dedicated place for managing Copilot. It will soon feature four sections: Overview, Health, Discover, and Settings. Overview will provide key metrics and insights including active user rate, AI assistance score, Copilot-assisted hours, and user sentiment. Health will consolidate Copilot-specific health insights such as device update status for Microsoft 365 apps, distribution of devices with diagnostic data, Copilot-specific message center posts, and known active issues. Discover will allow you to explore Copilot capabilities, understand user eligibility requirements, and access curated resources. These resources will cover compliance standards, adoption guidance, the Copilot prompt library, and more. You can also purchase Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses here. Settings will offer essential controls to configure Microsoft 365 Copilot to meet your organization’s needs and navigate to other key control surfaces including agent management and data security and compliance settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Shared with Me Settings page
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a new settings page that will give users details on the permissions they have for the Shared folders and mailboxes that they have added to the new Outlook for Windows and OWA. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Online archive for shared mailboxes in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Online archive mailboxes will appear in the folder pane alongside other accounts, making it easier to access archived content for shared mailboxes. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Draft on a selection and retain your existing formatting
CurrentVersion.description: Draft on a selection and retain your existing formatting so that your content is seamless and fits with your document.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Choose the level of detail for summaries when documents are opened
CurrentVersion.description: If you like brevity or more depth in the summaries that Copilot generates when you open a document, you can now specify your preference as brief, standard, or detailed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Apple and Android devices
CurrentVersion.description: Gain more inventory information about your Apple and Android devices.
